channel.title: @ How can i change my starting area @
channel.description:
If u have played edgeville pking by Demise, his starting area is in a a cave and u need to talk to a king/knightld he to go to normla place, i wonder if i can copy that and transfer to my server?
if not, how can i hcange my starting place to different area? ::coords or something and put were or wtf? help me plz, i really appreciate if u could help me out..

item.title: @ How can i change my starting area @
item.dc:creator: @puffypain puffypain
item.description:
@puffypain wrote:

Ok, so first find the starting coordinates (in the emote tab) and open player.java, search the coordinates and replace them to your needs. here are some useful coordinates:

Varrok - 3210 3434
Falador - 2964 3378
Yanille - 2606 3093

(more on google)

Read full topic
item.source: @ How can i change my starting area @

Yes it is a 317 server and to change starting coords i think you go into playerhandler.java (not sure)
